TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_adiyuc, title = adiyuc, year = 2024, month = November, day = 18, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/adiyuc} }

S.FORM: satangahan u zuma a kamu u kamu nu Hulam: u kamu nu Amilika:whirlwind u kamu nu Zipun: tinaku a kamu adiyuc tabakiyay adiyuc sa mibituwad tu luma'. . paadiyucan paadiyucan ku ni paanipan ni Pelac. Pelac . malaadiyuc malaadiyuc ku bali nu lalud. . siadiyuc muculil ci Tubah sa siadiyuc ku nazikuzan. Tubah . malalitin tu ihekalay atu zumaay a natinengan
